post.title: PreDB Sites & XDCC Search engine
post.body:
![](http://i.imgur.com/1bMNmdv.gif)
![](http://i.imgur.com/wFjkpOO.png) **PreDB Sites**
`Each release that gets released will result as a record in a pre-database.This record will at least contain the time the release was released and the release name (the name of the folder that contains the files of the release).The size and nature of the release are often provided too.Nukes are linked with their release in these databases when a nuke is issued. To check if a release is nuked, a scener uses an IRC channel to query the database by typing commands. These IRC channels are called pre channels and are often not accessible for the general public.The database is updated automatically through spidering topsites or by catching pre-release announcements from site channels`

post.title: Info: Japanese Movies [17/11/16]
post.body:
![](http://i.imgur.com/rB5yDwW.png)
>![](http://i.imgur.com/86tPd2N.jpg)
**Tetsuo: The Iron Man / tetsuo 1 (1989)**
Shinya Tsukamoto
[Avistaz](https://avistaz.to/movie/2778-tetsuo-the-iron-man)
`[Avistaz] Tetsuo: The Iron Man is a 1989 Japanese cyberpunk film by cult-film director Shinya Tsukamoto produced by Japan Home Video. This, his third film, is an extremely graphic but also strikingly-filmed fantasy shot in the same low-budget, underground-production style as his first two films. Revolving around the transformation of people into grotesque hybrids of flesh and metal, Tetsuo is above all an overwhelming audiovisual experience, set to a brain-pounding score by Chu Ishikawa and complemented by suitably exaggerated sound effects.`

---

>![](http://i.imgur.com/PjCCVK2.jpg)
**Tokyo Fist /  Tokyo Fisuto (1995)**
Shinya Tsukamoto
[Avistaz](https://avistaz.to/movie/2702-tokyo-fist)
`[Avistaz] A businessman, Tsuda, runs into a childhood friend, Tajuki, on the subway. Tajuki is working as a semiprofessional boxer. Tsuda soon begins to suspect that Tajuki might be having an affair with his fiance Hizuru. After an altercation, Tsuda begins training rigorously himself, leading to an extremely bloody, violent confrontation.`

---

>![](http://i.imgur.com/rlvkQPR.jpg)
**the stranger from afar / Marebito (2004)**
Takashi Shimizu
[Avistaz](https://avistaz.to/movie/401-marebito)
`[Avistaz] A fear-obsessed freelance cameraman investigates an urban legend involving mysterious spirits that haunt the subways of Tokyo.`

---

>![](http://i.imgur.com/LBzq2cD.jpg)
**Infection / kansen (2004)**
Masayuki Ochiai
[Avistaz](https://avistaz.to/movie/5757-infection)
`[Avistaz] Infection takes place in a dark, isolated hospital, where one doctors mistake has led to dire consequences for a patient. In a hospital death is just a breath away.`

---

>![](http://i.imgur.com/OhJWjP9.jpg)
**Pulse / kairo (2001)**
Kiyoshi Kurosawa
[Avistaz](https://avistaz.to/movie/2075-pulse)
`[Avistaz] After one of their friends commits suicide, strange things begin happening to a group of young Tokyo residents. One of them sees visions of his dead friend in the shadows on the wall, while another's computer keeps showing strange, ghostly images. Is their friend trying to contact them from beyond the grave, or is there something much more sinister going on?`

---

>![](http://i.imgur.com/uAkgv3J.jpg)
**Lala Pipo: A Lot of People / lalapipo (2009)**
Masayuki Miyano
[Avistaz](https://avistaz.to/movie/2124-lala-pipo-a-lot-of-people)
`[Avistaz] Adapted from a sex-stuffed cult novel, LALAPIPO (a play on the phrase “A Lot of People”) follows divergent seedy strands of sexual and narrative spaghetti through the sticky Tokyo night. There’s a chubby freelance writer who’s so obsessed with masturbating to the sound of his upstairs neighbors going at it that he forgets to deal with his own love life and when he finally does have sex he is immediately filled with self-loathing. The upstairs neighbor’s story then splits off like an amoeba: she’s an office lady seduced by a “talent scout” who is falling down the sex industry ladder, moving from hostess, to massage girl, to private karaoke attendant. The talent scout’s story then splits off and runs in its own direction, revealing the sorry state of this young pimp’s soul. From there, the movie takes more and more time to consider the lives of more and more characters until the entire Japanese sex industry is filled with the wailing of lost souls.`

---

>![](http://i.imgur.com/sCxIhil.jpg)
**Fish Story (2009)**
Yoshihiro Nakamura
[Avistaz](https://avistaz.to/movie/2365-fish-story)
`[Avistaz] A rock band writes a song called "Fish Story" based on a sentence from a badly translated novel by a quack translator. The song exceeds the boundaries of space and time and ties people and their stories together. Thirty-seven years go by, and the song strikes a comet and saves the Earth from total destruction.`

---

>![](http://i.imgur.com/lxr9Zji.jpg)
**Detroit Metal City / detoroito metaru shiti (2008)**
Toshio Lee
[Avistaz](https://avistaz.to/movie/1646-detroit-metal-city)
`[Avistaz] Soichi Negishi moved to Tokyo to chase his dream of becoming a musician playing stylish, Swedish-style pop. Instead, he finds himself leading the death metal band Detroit Metal City, or DMC, as the costumed and grotesquely made-up "demon emperor" Johannes Krauser II. Although he hates the role and the things he has to do as a member of the band, he has a definite talent for it.`

---

>![](http://i.imgur.com/PiXYMzM.jpg)
**Hello, My Dolly Girlfriend / figyua na anata (2013)**
Takashi Ishii
[Avistaz](https://avistaz.to/movie/6839-hello-my-dolly-girlfriend)
`[Avistaz] A lonely otaku is fired from his job. He is rescued in a ruined building by a strange girl in a sailor suit. When he wakes up, the girl becomes a figure. The young man and the pretty figure begin to live together.`

---

>![](http://i.imgur.com/YN4pv6X.jpg)
**Woman in the Dunes / suna no onna (1964)**
Hiroshi Teshigahara
[Avistaz](https://avistaz.to/movie/926-woman-in-the-dunes)
`[Avistaz] Jumpei Niki, a Tokyo based entomologist and educator, is in a poor seaside village collecting specimens of sand insects. As it is late in the day and as he has missed the last bus back to the city, some of the local villagers suggest that he spend the night there, they offering to find him a place to stay.`

---

>![](http://i.imgur.com/3keCU52.jpg)
**The Face of Another / tanin no kao (1966)**
Hiroshi Teshigahara
[Avistaz](https://avistaz.to/movie/823-the-face-of-another)
`[Avistaz] A businessman with a disfigured face obtains a lifelike mask from his doctor, but the mask starts altering his personality.`

---

>![](http://i.imgur.com/GzSR1xH.jpg)
**The Man Without a Map / moetsukita chizu (1968)**
Hiroshi Teshigahara
[Avistaz](https://avistaz.to/movie/3989-the-man-without-a-map)
`[Avistaz] A private detective is hired to find a missing man by his wife. While his search is unsuccessful, the detective's own life begins to resemble the man for whom he is searching.`

---

>![](http://i.imgur.com/zCAORJW.jpg)
**The Human Condition I: No Greater Love / Ningen no jôken  (1959)**
Masaki Kobayashi
[Avistaz](https://avistaz.to/movie/2352-the-human-condition-i-no-greater-love)
`[Avistaz] The Human Condition is a Japanese epic film trilogy made between 1959 and 1961. The trilogy follows the life of Kaji, a Japanese pacifist and socialist, as he tries to survive in the fascist and oppressive world of WWII-era Japan. No Greater Love (1959) opens with Kaji marrying his sweetheart Michiko despite his misgivings about the future.`
**The Human Condition II: Road to Eternity / Ningen no jôken (1959)**
Masaki Kobayashi
[Avistaz](https://avistaz.to/movie/5536-the-human-condition-ii-road-to-eternity)
`[Avistaz] Kaji, having lost his exemption from military service by protecting Chinese prisoners from unjust punishment, has now been conscripted into the Japanese Kwantung Army. Despite his anti-militarism, Kaji excels in his training and tries to implement his ideals in his dealings with other soldiers in the face of the prevailing brutality. The film ends with the Soviet army's victorious onslaught.`
**The Human Condition III: A Soldier's Prayer / Ningen no jôken (1961)**
Masaki Kobayashi
[Avistaz](https://avistaz.to/movie/5538-the-human-condition-iii-a-soldiers-prayer)
`[Avistaz] The Japanese forces having been shattered, Kaji and some comrades embark on an epic journey on foot southward to where Kaji hopes to rejoin Michiko. After surviving many perils he is captured by the Red Army and subjected to treatment that echoes that meted out to the Chinese.`

---

>![](http://i.imgur.com/0jQYwPI.jpg)
**Samurai Rebellion / jôi-uchi: hairyô tsuma shimatsu (1967)**
Masaki Kobayashi
[Avistaz](https://avistaz.to/movie/5982-samurai-rebellion)
`[Avistaz] The mother of a feudal lord's only heir is kidnapped away from her husband by the lord. The husband and his samurai father must decide whether to accept the unjust decision, or risk death to get her back.`

---

>![](http://i.imgur.com/aqvHPrs.jpg)
**With Beauty and Sorrow/utsukushisa to kanashimi to (1965)**
Masahiro Shinoda
[Avistaz](https://avistaz.to/movie/3931-with-beauty-and-sorrow)
`[Avistaz] When the man who seduced the famous painter Otoko as a teenager--and then wrote a bestselling novel about it--reappears in her life, her pupil--and lesbian lover--hatches a plot to destroy the man and his family.`

---

>![](http://i.imgur.com/TfQXOVi.jpg)
**Double Suicide/shinjû: ten no amijima (1969)**
Masahiro Shinoda
[Avistaz](https://avistaz.to/movie/989-double-suicide)
`[Avistaz] Set in Osaka in the 18th century, the film centers on the doomed romance between Jihei (Kichiemon Nakamura), a down and out married paper merchant passionately in love with doe-eyed courtesan Koharu (Shima Iwashita), whom he cannot afford to buy out of servitude. Koharu herself has also fallen in love with Jihei; she even starts turning away other patrons to be with him. Their love is further imperiled by Tahei (Hosei Komatsu), a rich, obnoxious merchant who flaunts his ability to buy Koharu's indenture. Suicide is the only way for the two to be together.`

---

>![](http://i.imgur.com/BIcHYLG.jpg)
**Takeshi: Childhood Days/shonen jidai (1990)**
Masahiro Shinoda
[Avistaz](https://avistaz.to/movie/5869-takeshi-childhood-days)
`[Avistaz] A story of childhood life during wartime Japan. Takeshi, the intelligent son of a fisherman, is the schoolyard bully. When his cousin comes to stay with his family to avoid bombing raids, Takeshi at first treats him well, then begins bullying him too. Takeshi eventually loses his position of leadership.`

---

>![](http://i.imgur.com/6ROclv0.jpg)
**Pale Flower/kawaita hana (1964)**
Masahiro Shinoda
[Avistaz](https://avistaz.to/movie/4235-pale-flower)
`[Avistaz] Muraki, a hardboiled Yakuza gangster, has just been released from prison after serving a sentence for murder. Revisiting his old gambling haunts, he meets Saeko, a striking young upper-class woman who is out seeking thrills, and whose presence adds spice to the staid masculine underworld rituals. Muraki becomes her mentor while simultaneously coping with the shifts of power that have affected the gangs while he was interred. When he notices a rogue, drug-addicted young punk hanging around the gambling dens, he realizes that Saeko's insatiable lust for intense pleasures may be leading her to self-destruction.`

---

>![](http://i.imgur.com/lvlFJL2.jpg)
**Noriko's Dinner Table/noriko no shokutaku (2005)**
Sion Sono
[Avistaz](https://avistaz.to/movie/117-norikos-dinner-table)
`[Avistaz] A teenager called Noriko Shimabara runs away from her family in Tokoyama, to meet Kumiko, the leader of an Internet BBS, Haikyo.com. She becomes involved with Kumiko's "family circle", which grows darker after the mass suicide of 54 high school girls.`

---

>![](http://i.imgur.com/HuGXwyy.jpg)
**Strange Circus/kimyou na circus (2005)**
Sion Sono
[Avistaz](https://avistaz.to/movie/1000-strange-circus)
`[Avistaz] The erotic novelist Taeko is writing a morbid story of a family destroyed by incest, murder and abuse. Her assistant, Yuji, sets on a mission to uncover the reality of this story, but the reality might be too much to bear.`

---

>![](http://i.imgur.com/0kJ1z3a.jpg)
**Exte: Hair Extensions/ekusute (2007)**
Sion Sono
[Avistaz](https://avistaz.to/movie/422-exte-hair-extensions)
`[Avistaz] An aspiring hair dresser (Kuriyama) becomes the infatuation of a tricophilic man who sells hair extensions to nearby hair salons. The source of the hair is the corpse of a girl whose dead body continues to grow beautiful, voluminous, black hair that comes alive, driving those who use the extensions insane or killing them.`

---

>![](http://i.imgur.com/G6QqAtd.jpg)
**Love Exposure/ai no mukidashi (2008)**
Sion Sono
[Avistaz](https://avistaz.to/movie/2174-love-exposure)
`[Avistaz] After Yu's mother dies his father, a priest, only seems to take solace in the confessions of his sons sins causing Yu to partake in various 'sinful' activities to appease him. This is a teen love story as only the Japanese could bring us, complete with up-skirt photography, cross dressing, and bloody gore.`

---

>![](http://i.imgur.com/Ntghsvw.jpg)
**Cold Fish/tsumetai nettaigyo (2010)**
Sion Sono
[Avistaz](https://avistaz.to/movie/4342-cold-fish)
`[Avistaz] Shamoto runs a small tropical fish shop. When his daughter Mitsuko is caught shoplifting at a grocery store a man named Murata steps in to settle things between the girl and the store manager. Murata also runs a tropical fish shop and he and Shamoto soon become friendly. However Murata hides many dark secrets behind his friendly face.`

----

>![](http://i.imgur.com/Tg9O47C.jpg)
**Guilty of Romance/koi no tsumi (2011)**
Sion Sono
[Avistaz](https://avistaz.to/movie/4836-guilty-of-romance)

post.body:
**Zeronet Project (Issue/Pull request)**

> ![](http://i.imgur.com/4D97cLX.jpg)

> `General improvements` `Optional file download/shared`

> 
> ![](http://i.imgur.com/RMm3pdx.jpg)
> `I2P` `I2P BitTorrent trackers`
> [Add I2P support_Github](https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/pull/602)
> 
> ![](http://i.imgur.com/vd23Qy4.jpg)
> `DHT` `Peers` `IPV6` `Tor`
> [DHT support_Github](https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/issues/57)

* * *

![](http://i.imgur.com/0ilPCTr.jpg)![](http://i.imgur.com/3Zy8O8Z.png)
**ZeroNet + I2P**

> Antes de nada, agradecer al usuario **cer** y a las publicaciones del 0blog [Blogueando](http://127.0.0.1:43110/procesos.bit/?Post:129:ZeroNet+Anonimato+=+I2P+(casi) la información; sin duda, recomiendo su blog, por la información expuesta de forma acertada y sin perder su carácter divulgativo; su constancia y dedicación por ofrecernos siempre noticias de este entorno, descentralizado y critico, y no por ello, desligado de su problematicidad, que siempre ondea a nivel de usuario, es decir, a nivel social, político y económico.
> Ahora bien, vamos a ello:
> En [github](https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/pull/602) nos encontramos con la siguiente entrada "Add I2P support"; se expone fácil pero nada mas lejos de la realidad: **se pretende romper el muro técnico entre zeronet e I2P a través de una implementación** gracias al usuario **str4d**. Es una buena noticia sin duda para todos los entusiastas del mundillo torrent.
> Os adjunto una imagen, nos cuenta los elementos en desarrollo para implementar dicha aplicabilidad a la red zeronet:
> ![](http://i.imgur.com/4toKznI.jpg)
> 
> ![](http://i.imgur.com/jXjILvG.gif) Esta noticia, por su carácter fortuito y momentáneo (a pesar de fuentes ya expuestas), bien podría ser un plagio, y de hecho así me lo parece, sepan perdonarme :)

* * *

![](http://i.imgur.com/rYZvpX4.jpg)

Gracias al usuario **Userzero** me enteré de varias noticias interesantes, esta es la primera de ellas: **la implementación de un add BitTorrent en zeronet**. La aplicabilidad puede ser amplia, al menos, eso esperamos...
Aquí tenéis la pagina que proporcionó el usuario sobre el evento:
[TorrentFrak_Steal This Show S02E01: Zeronet](https://torrentfreak.com/steal-show-s02e01-zeronet/)
Os adjunto parte del texto de interés:

> In addition he discusses plans to add a BitTorrent plugin that may be able to provide distributed, anonymous video streaming...

* * *

![](http://s03.s3c.es/imag/_v0/770x420/e/7/1/100x100_kickass-torrents.jpg)
**KAT en Zeronet: Respuesta de los administradores**

> With that and after talking with Mr.Prairi3DoG please no more threads or post asking to change how we do things. Please no more threads/posts asking to use zeronet. Admins have already said no to this idea. That's a standing decision for now and the future for a while. If and when things change they'll let us know them. They'll explain them to us. We have to trust them that they are doing the best and doing what is right by us. In the end KAT will be back even better, but it's going to take time. So let's focus on the community for now.

post.title: Anotaciones sobre el blog
post.body:
![](http://i.imgur.com/dFdySdO.gif)

![](http://i.imgur.com/krDopep.gif) **Newsfeed**
Usad el servicio Newsfeed para manteneros actualizados sobre la actividad del blog.

**Presentación**
"**F**ear **O**f **M**issing **O**ut"
Mi intención es centralizar los contenidos que puedo ofrecer a la comunidad de uploaders; se encuentra un poco lejos de un proyecto serio, pero intentaré mantener actualizados los links de forma que siempre exista una vía.
Gracias por la visita!
Saludos!

---

**Anotaciones sobre este ZEROBlog**
Dada la naturaleza de la información presentada en mi blog, utilizaré cada entrada del mismo de forma "acumulativa", es decir, si el tema a tratar es, por ejemplo, metabuscadores de torrent y existen entradas anteriores con esa temática, fusionaré ambas entradas. Pretendiendo con ello la simplificación de los contenidos, y con ésto, *sortear la redundancia de datos* para todos aquellos que alojáis mi blog en vuestra zeronet.
